text: Sum tame nathi joyum ke allaha'e ja dharatini dareka vastune tamara mate kame lagadela che ane tena adesathi panimam calati hodi'o pana, tene ja akasane roki rakhyum che, ke dharati para teni paravanagi vagara padi na jaya, ni:Sanka allaha ta'ala loko mate mayalu ane namrata dakhavanara tatha dayalu che
